channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Satellite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Satellite

item.title: CVE-2017-7538|2024-08-05T16:04:11.974Z -- red%20hat -- satellite
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) flaw was found in how an organization name is displayed in Satellite 5, before 5.8. A user able to change an organization's name could exploit this flaw to perform XSS attacks against other Satellite users.
